title: Refill Polygon Pools with Anonymity/Liquidity Reward
body:
# Background

Cyclone is the leading #PriFi protocol that offers cross-chain + zkSNARKs-based privacy, with yield enhancement, governed by the decentralized DAO. Cyclone has been successfully launched on IoTeX, BSC, Ethereum and Polygon.

# Proposal

The proposal suggests refilling the following pools that are about to finish their first 90 days of the mission, yet still very active in terms of TVL. Once passed, additional CYC will be minted and injected into these pools on 10/25 0:00AM UTC to support them operate for another 90 days with the proposed amount of anonymity/liquidity reward.

## Polygon - Pool Pentagon

Asset: 1,000 MATIC

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.06 CYC per day

## Polygon - Pool Hexagon

Asset: 1,000 USDC

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.03 CYC per day

## Polygon - Pool Octagon

Asset: 2 QUICK

Life Cycle: 90 days

Anonymity Mining v2: 0.03 CYC per day

## CYC-MATIC Liquidity Pool

Asset: CYC/MATIC LP

Life Cycle: 90 days

Liquidity Mining: 20 CYC per day

# The Vote

This proposal needs to be approved via a vote by the community before execution.

# Discussion

Please discuss this proposal in this forum thread.
author: 0x4891f20A4C681DE9aB75AF9523e2f070A26f9a20
